message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for $11,500. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to respond quickly if you're interested.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but your price is a little high for me. Would you consider $10,000?
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. I am willing to sell the product for $11,000. Please let me know if this works for you.
I appreciate you working with me, Alice. How about we split the difference and settle at $10,500?
